body: Bruh, no. You need 10 A-10, 30 AC-130, and 50 Castle Bravo just for good measure
Moral of the story: attacking demons with just shitty blades and armour won't do a shit. You need Russian A-135 anti-ballistic for defens and T-14 tanks for attacking the enemy base .

Hot.

If you wanna read a manga where humans are the aggressors, I recommend Hilck.
That lore was a tad bit interesting. Not bad, I like my demon futas
I'd like to read a story where what she said was true. Maybe a continuation where he becomes her pet
Quite an interesting view. And the fact that many modern stories writing about humans (by, obviously, humans)  painting them in such a bad light is a bit funny.
Was the gender bender thing really necesarry? Anyways getting fucked by your own amputated cock is indeed humiliating.
These gender bend doujins miss the point when its a character that looks like there was no real change what so ever
